description: Relatives of those who policed Ireland under British rule give opposing views on commemorating them.
title: RIC commemoration: 100-year-old war wound that came back to bite
title_page: RIC commemoration: 100-year-old war wound that came back to bite - BBC News
maintext: "We have to understand the past of course, but we don't have to take our lead from people just because we were related to them in some bygone time."
